original: vajramahākālastotram
ācāryanāgārjunakṛtam
analyzed: ācārya nāgārjuna kṛtam

original: hāṃ hāṃ hāṃkāranādaiḥ kilikilitaravaiḥ bhūtavetālavṛndai-
analyzed: hāṃ hāṃ hāṃkāra nādaiḥ kili kilita ravaiḥ bhūta vetāla vṛndaiḥ

original: rhu huṃkāraiḥ samantānnarapiśitamukhai raktamālākulāṅgaiḥ |
analyzed: rhu huṃkāraiḥ rakta mālā ākula aṅgaiḥ

original: khaṭvāṅgaskannapāṇirnarakarakadharaḥ kāmarūpī virūpī
piṅgākṣaḥ piṅgakeśaḥ śavagaṇanalakaḥ kṣetrapālo'vatādvaḥ || 1 ||
analyzed: piṅga akṣaḥ piṅga keśaḥ śava gaṇa nalakaḥ   /

original: pheṃ pheṃ pheṃkāranādaiḥ pratijanitabṛhadvahnigarbhāṅgavaktre
analyzed: pheṃ pheṃ pheṃkāra nādaiḥ pratijanita bṛhat vahni garbha aṅga vaktre

original: mālāṃ kaṇṭhe nidhāya prakaṭabhayavapurbhūṣitāṅgopaśobhaḥ |
analyzed: mālām kaṇṭhe nidhāya prakaṭa bhaya vapuḥ bhūṣita aṅga upaśobhaḥ

original: īṣadraktādharoṣṭho'sṛkasakalavṛtāmālinā muktapāṇiḥ
analyzed: īṣat rakta adhara uṣṭha usṛka sakala vṛtā mālinā mukta pāṇiḥ

original: klīṃ ḍāṃ klīṃ ḍāṃ ninādairvaradahanabhuvi kṣetrapaḥ pātu yuṣmān || 2 ||
analyzed: klīṃ ḍām klīṃ ḍām ninādaiḥ vara dahana bhuvi kṣetrapaḥ pātu yuṣmān

original: kṣaṃ kṣaṃ kṣaṃ kṣāntimūrtiḥ kalakalakalakṛt kṣāntivṛddhiṃ prakurvan |
analyzed: kṣaṃ kṣaṃ kṣaṃ kṣānti mūrtiḥ kalakala kala kṛt kṣānti vṛddhim prakurvan

original: krāntākrāntaikaviśvaḥ kahakahakathano nīlajīmūtavarṇaḥ |
hrīṃ śrīṃ klīṃ mantradehaḥ paca paca dahanairjātamantraḥ samantād
analyzed: hrīṃ śrīṃ klīṃ mantra dehaḥ paca paca dahanaiḥ jāta mantraḥ samantāt

original: vighnānutsāryamāṇaḥ śamayatu niyataṃ śātravān kṣetrapālaḥ || 3 ||
analyzed: vighnān utsāryamāṇaḥ śamayatu niyatam śātravān kṣetrapālaḥ  /

original: hā hā hā hāṭṭahāsairatiśayabhayakṛt sarvadā'satpaśūnāṃ
analyzed: hā hā hā hā aṭṭahāsaiḥ atiśaya bhaya kṛt sarvadā asat paśūnām

original: pāpānām, vighnahantā pratidivasamasau prāptasaṃbodhilābhaḥ |
analyzed: pāpānām vighna hantā pratidivasam asau prāpta saṃbodhi lābhaḥ

original: huṃ phaṭ huṃphaṭaninādaistribhuvanakuharaṃ pūrayan pūrṇaśaktiḥ
analyzed: hum phaṭ huṃ phaṭa ninādaiḥ tribhuvana kuharam pūrayan pūrṇa śaktiḥ

original: pāyācchrīkṣetrapālaḥ kapilatarajaṭājūṭakleśāṅgabhāraḥ || 4 ||
analyzed: pāyāt śrī kṣetrapālaḥ kapilatara jaṭā jūṭa kleśa aṅga bhāraḥ

original: khaṃ khaṃ khaṃ khaṅgapāṇirlalalalalalito rūpato raktapāṇiḥ
analyzed: khaṃ khaṃ khaṃ khaṅga pāṇiḥ lalalala lalitaḥ rūpataḥ rakta pāṇiḥ

original: raṃ raṃ raṃ raktanetro ru ru rudhirakaraścarcitaścaṇḍavegaḥ |
analyzed: raṃ raṃ raṃ rakta netraḥ ru ru rudhira karaḥ carcitaḥ caṇḍa vegaḥ

original: kruṃ kruṃ kruṃ krodhadṛṣṭiḥ kuha kuha kuṭilaḥ kuñcitāśeṣaduṣṭaḥ
analyzed: kruṃ kruṃ kruṃ krodha dṛṣṭiḥ kuha kuha kuṭilaḥ kuñcita aśeṣa duṣṭaḥ

original: ḍaṃ ḍaṃ ḍaṃ ḍāmarāṅgo ḍamarukasahito rakṣatāt kṣetrapālaḥ || 5 ||
analyzed: ḍaṃ ḍaṃ ḍaṃ ḍāmara aṅgaḥ ḍamaruka sahitaḥ rakṣatāt kṣetrapālaḥ

original: yaṃ yaṃ yaṃ yāti viśvaṃ yamaniyamayuto yāmino'yāmino vā
analyzed: yam yam yam yāti viśvam yama niyama yutaḥ yāminaḥ yāminaḥ vā

original: vaṃ vaṃ vaṃ vātavego jhaṭiti karakadhṛt prāptalokopacāraḥ |
analyzed: vaṃ vaṃ vaṃ vāta vegaḥ jhaṭiti karaka dhṛt prāpta loka upacāraḥ

original: bhrūṃ bhrūṃ bhrūṃ bhīṣaṇāṅgo bhṛkuṭikṛtabhayo muktivān sādhakānāṃ
analyzed: bhrūṃ bhrūṃ bhrūṃ bhīṣaṇa aṅgaḥ bhṛkuṭi kṛta bhayaḥ muktivān sādhakānām

original: kṣaṃ kṣaṃ kṣaṃ kṣemakārī kṣapayatu duritaṃ rakṣatāt kṣetrapālaḥ || 6 ||
analyzed: kṣaṃ kṣaṃ kṣaṃ kṣemakārī kṣapayatu duritam rakṣatāt kṣetrapālaḥ

original: klāṃ klāṃ klāṃ krāntimūrtistribhuvanamaniśaṃ kledayan sarvadā yaḥ
analyzed: klāṃ klāṃ klāṃ krānti mūrtiḥ tribhuvanam aniśam kledayan sarvadā yaḥ

original: paṃ paṃ paṃ pāśahastaḥ paraśudhṛtakaraḥ pālayan pālanīyān |
analyzed: paṃ paṃ paṃ pāśa hastaḥ paraśu dhṛta karaḥ pālayan pālanīyān

original: mudrāṇāṃ mantramūrtistvamabhimataphalado mantriṇāṃ mantratulyaḥ
analyzed: mudrāṇām mantra mūrtiḥ tvam abhimata phala daḥ mantriṇām mantra tulyaḥ

original: kṣetrāṇāṃ pālako'sau sakalajitatanuḥ pātu yuṣmāṃścirāyuḥ || 7 ||
analyzed: kṣetrāṇām pālakā usau sakala jita tanuḥ pātu yuṣmān cira āyuḥ

original: klīṃ klīṃ klīṃ kṛttivāsā kṛtaripuniyamaḥ kleśitānāṃ sadeśaḥ
analyzed: klīṃ klīṃ klīṃ kṛttivāsā kṛta ripu niyamaḥ kleśitānām sa deśaḥ

original: kaṃ kaṃ kaṃ kapālamālī kalikaluṣaharaḥ kālavṛndābhakāyaḥ |
analyzed: kaṃ kaṃ kaṃ kapāla mālī kali kaluṣa haraḥ kāla vṛnda ābha kāyaḥ

original: caṃ caṃ caṃ caṇḍavegaḥ pracaritasamayāḥ kālabhūtaikalokaḥ
analyzed: caṃ caṃ caṃ caṇḍa vegaḥ pracarita samayāḥ kāla bhūta eka lokaḥ

original: saṃ saṃ saṃ saṃyatātmā samayaśubhaphalaṃ lakṣyatāṃ pātu yuṣmān || 8 ||
analyzed: sam sam sam saṃyata ātmā samaya śubha phalam lakṣyatām pātu yuṣmān

original: mantrāṇāṃ manrakāyo niyatayamadyutiḥ satpathe śūddhatīre
analyzed: mantrāṇām manra kāyaḥ niyata yama dyutiḥ sat pathe śūddha tīre

original: ācāryaḥ sādhako vā japati ca niyataṃ puṇyavān jāyate'sau |
analyzed: ācāryaḥ sādhakaḥ vā japati ca niyatam puṇyavān jāyate asau

original: āyuḥ śrīḥ kīrtilakṣmīrdhṛtibalamatulaṃ śāntipuṣṭī prabhā ca
analyzed: āyuḥ śrīḥ kīrti lakṣmīḥ dhṛti balam atulam śānti puṣṭī prabhā ca

original: sarvajñatvaṃ ca nityaṃ dinaniśamatulaṃ naśyate vighnajātam || 9 ||
analyzed: sarvajña tvam ca nityam dina niśam atulam naśyate vighna jātam

original: śrīvajramahākālastotraṃ samāptam |
analyzed: śrī vajra mahākāla stotram samāptam
